      • load

        public IImageLoadAgent load(@NonNull
                            android.content.Context context,
                            @NonNull
                            java.lang.String url,
                            @DrawableRes
                            int placeholderId,
                            @DrawableRes
                            int errorId,
                            ImageLoadCallBack callBack)
        load net image resource
        参数:
        context - Context
        url - image link
        placeholderId - place holder image when image before or during load
        errorId - place holder image when image load fail

      • clearDiskCache

        @WorkerThread
public void clearDiskCache(@NonNull
                                          android.content.Context context)
        clear disk cache.

        This method should be called on a background thread, since it is a blocking call.

                       android.content.Context context)
